commit.message:
YIN and pYIN (#1063)

* YIN and pYIN

* Add test data

* Refactor and fix based on review

* Use octaves per second for maximum transition rate

* Make fmin and fmax required parameters and return voiced flag from pyin

* Updated doc strings and added example

* Remove math import and change window length default

* Use localmin and add fill_na

* Add tests and fix error messages

commit.message:
Use Numba API location for jit import. (#1164)

As title. Imports Numba's `jit` decorator from the Numba API
location opposed to Numba's internals.

verification.payload:
tree 200ff4b85b82b891a4e04c92307faf2e5cfcdc36
parent 960414420ae530d14608af29608de81cead19e7c
author stuartarchibald <stuartarchibald@users.noreply.github.com> 1592241354 +0100
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1592241354 -0400

Use Numba API location for jit import. (#1164)

As title. Imports Numba's `jit` decorator from the Numba API
location opposed to Numba's internals.
